name: Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Ensure line and level of wastewater has been marked out and agreed with Engineer in accordance with the drawings.

Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Install Erosion Sediment Control measures in line with PWRBSS ESCP plans
○ Inspect, monitor, and maintain ESCP measures weekly and immediately before & after significant weather events

Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Inform stakeholders of upcoming works
○ Agree plans for maintaining access to properties during construction with landowners
Standard / Specification - Project Stakeholder Management Plan
Frequency - Prior to Construction with continue updates throughout the works
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Permit to Dig must be in place before any ground breaking activity commences, incl. trenching, driving waratahs or survey pegs, and topsoil strip.
○ Permit to Dig will be based on BBO existing Services Drawings, Before U Dig Plans , potholing by the project, CAT & Genny survey, and visual inspections.
○ All known services must be clearly marked on site and briefed to the workforce.
Verifying Document - Ground Disturbance Permit DN-ZH-FM043.1
○ Reviewed and Reissued weekly or when site conditions change
